voiceDetection.title: Voice Detection
voiceDetection.description: Configure how the AI detects when you're speaking
voiceDetection.conservativeDesc: Waits for you to finish speaking. Reduces unwanted responses.
voiceDetection.alwaysOnDesc: Automatic voice detection. AI responds when you stop speaking.
voiceDetection.pushToTalkDesc: Hold Space key to transmit. Best for preventing unwanted responses.
voiceDetection.toggleDesc: Press Space to start/stop transmission. Like a walkie-talkie.
voiceDetection.inputModeWarning: ⚠️ Input mode must be set before connecting
